The documents in this folder are copies of the following files from the Microsoft Learn patterns library:

- *contributor-guide.md*: [Write a reliability guide](https://learn.microsoft.com/help/patterns/level4/article-reliability)
- *reliability-template.md:* [Template for reliability article pattern](https://learn.microsoft.com/help/patterns/level4/contribute-reliability-template)

They're included in this repo to enable Copilot prompts, which can't currently look outside of the current active repo.
